title: Five Tool - Confirm photo uploaded to correct headshot space
custom_preconds: The user has a headshot file for uploading
custom_steps: The user drags new image to upload in the New Headshot space
custom_expected: The photo is uploaded to the correct headshot space

title: Five Tool - Confirm user notified of location and path
custom_preconds: The user has a headshot file for uploading
custom_steps: The user hovers the image above the New headshot space
custom_expected: The user is notified of "location/path of where the headshot will be uploaded"

title: Five Tool - Confirm uploaded image appears alongside current headshot
custom_preconds: The user has a headshot file for uploading
custom_steps: The user drags new image to upload in the New Headshot space with an already existing photo
custom_expected: The to upload image appears alongside the current headshot

title: Five Tool - Confirm removal of headshot
custom_preconds: The user intends to remove the to upload image
custom_steps: The user clicks the red (X) in the top right corner of the to-upload image.
custom_expected: The to upload image is removed from the new headshot space.

title: Five Tool - Confirm image tags
custom_preconds: The user has a headshot file for uploading
custom_steps: The user drags new image to upload in the New Headshot space with an already existing photo
custom_expected: Tags to add to the uploaded image appear next to the image to be uploaded.

title: Five Tool - Confirm upload button
custom_preconds: The user has a headshot file for uploading
custom_steps: The user drags new image to upload in the New Headshot space and is selected
custom_expected: The upload button is enabled once an image is selected

title: Five Tool - Confirm headshot uploaded to correct endpoint
custom_preconds: The user has a headshot file for uploading
custom_steps: The user clicks the Upload button
custom_expected: The headshot file is uploaded to the correct endpoint

title: Five Tool - Confirm renaming of headshot file
custom_preconds: The user has a headshot file for uploading
custom_expected: The existing headshot filename is renamed.

title: Five Tool - Confirm correct tags are applied to file
custom_preconds: The user has a headshot file for uploading
custom_steps: The user drags new image to upload in the New Headshot space and selects upload
custom_expected: The following tags are applied to the uploaded headshot:  playerid-{playerId}, headshot-silo, season-2021

title: Five Tool - Confirm upload to lower environments
custom_preconds: The user has a headshot file for uploading to a lower environment
custom_steps: The user drags new image to upload in the New Headshot space in a lower environment
custom_expected: In environments lower than BETA/PROD, the current images should fetch and upload from big papi-qa/{uploadPath}

title: Five Tool - Confirm toaster message on success
custom_preconds: The user has a headshot file for uploading
custom_steps: The user successfully uploads in the New Headshot space and selects upload
custom_expected: A toaster message is displayed to confirm upload was successful

title: Five Tool - Confirm toaster message on failure
custom_preconds: The user has a headshot file for uploading
custom_steps: The user unsuccessfully uploads in the New Headshot space and selects upload
custom_expected: A toaster message is displayed to confirm upload was not successful

title: Five Tool - Confirm headshot is displayed in correct space
custom_preconds: The user has a headshot file for uploading
custom_steps: The user successfully uploads in the New Headshot space and selects upload
custom_expected: The uploaded headshot is displayed in the current headshot space and the new headshot space is empty.

title: Five Tool - Confirm progress bar
custom_preconds: The user has a headshot file for uploading
custom_steps: The user successfully uploads in the New Headshot space and selects upload
custom_expected: An upload progress bar (moving from left to right) that tracks the photo upload estimated time of completion.

title: Five Tool - Confirm json file has correct config changes
custom_preconds: The user wants to update the Asset Type in FiveTool config
custom_steps:
The user updates the asset Type (e.g. typeName, id: hero)
Gameday Headshot (83)
Bio/Player Page Headshot (67)
Gameday Headshot (83)
Bio/Player Page Headshot (67)
Coach Headshot 83
Coach Headshot 67
Pitching Primary
Pitching Away Jersey
Action Vertical
Press Box
MiLB Master Headshot
Coach Headshot 83
Coach Headshot 67
Pitching Primary
Pitching Away Jersey
Action Vertical
Press Box
MiLB Master Headshot
The standard for each supported type should display:
name of the asset type (typeName)
current image with correct aspect ratio (nativeAR)
upload spot
upload button
tags when image is in the upload spot
Display order for player assetTypes:
Silo Headshot
Bio/Player Page Headshot (67)
Gameday Headshot (83)
Hero Action Shot 
Pitching Primary Action Shot
Pitching Away Jersey Action Shot
Vertical Action Shot
Press Box Photo
Coach Bio Headshot (67)
Coach Gameday Headshot (83)
MiLB Master Headshot
custom_expected: The json file is updated with the asset type config changes.

title: Five Tool - Confirm Player Management Page
custom_preconds: The user visits the Player Image Management Page and wants to see a player's current headshot to determine if it needs to be updated
custom_steps: The user views the Player Image Management Page
custom_expected:
The following features/options are available:
The page should have text input to enter a player id 
There should be a button for a user to click to conduct an image asset search for the entered player id
Hitting "enter" on the keyboard while in the text input should also conduct the image asset search
If player is not found, display some error message (exact message/display TBD)
The full name, current team, and position for the player id should be displayed as a result
The current headshot in Cloudinary for the player id should be displayed as a result
There should be a spot next to the current headshot for a user to set a new headshot to upload
There should be a button to allow a user to upload a new headshot
The upload button should be disabled at this point
The current image should be linkable and open in a new window/tab
There should be an info panel at the right end of an asset type on a photo management page
The info panel should contain the following about each asset type:
> Native Width
> Native Height
> Aspect Ratio
